text: Faraon skazal, obrashchayas' k svoyemu narodu so slovami, kotoryye vyzvali ikh gnev: "Musa - etot poslannik, kotoryy yakoby poslan k vam, - bezumets, ibo yego sprashivayut ob odnom, a on otvechayet o drugom. On pripisyvayet vashemu gospodu strannyye kachestva, i ya prizyvayu vas ne verit' yego slovam i oprovergnut' ikh
